p: The dengue positive cases were seen distributed in 6 districts in the year 2016. Imphal West district showing the highest positivity followed by Imphal East. In the year 2017 distribution of dengue positive cases were seen in all the districts of Manipur with Churachandpur district having highest positivity followed by Imphal East, Imphal West. While the least positive cases were observed in Tamenglong district. In the case of 2018 the highest positive cases were from Imphal East district and Thoubal district. While three district namely Bishnupur, Chandel and Tamenglong did not have any positive cases ( Fig.Â 3).
